resources.string: Welcome to the BBC news and Weather App, use the menu button to select a feed. created by Alexander MacDiarmid S1307325
View the most recent news for the selected category. Tap a news story to get more information.
Tap the arrow to view more information for a city. Arrow shows wind direction, colour red greater than 10°C, orange between 0°C and 10, blue less than 0°C
personalize you experience with the app.
Press the web button to open this news in your web browser, press save to save this piece of news for reading latter.
Sorry there was an error loading the dialog.
